Package com.gwt.ss

$Id: package-info.java 327 2014-04-14 21:15:20Z steven.jardine@gmail.com $.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClassUtil
    Utility class to find classes in a package.
    GwtExceptionTranslator
    Required.
    GwtLogoutSuccessHandler
    Assign to <logout success-handler-ref="hander-reference"/> fot handle logout action.
    When logout from GWT RPC, just void message return.
    GwtResponseUtil
    Utility for handle GWT RPC response.
    GWT RPC 回應處理工具類別
    GwtSessionManagement
    If you apply Session Management in your secured gwt application,you need to make sure property "proxy-target-class" of <aop:aspectj-autoproxy> set as "false" owing to Spring's proxy mechanism only allow null constructor,unfortunately SessionManagementFilter didn't. Instantiate this bean
    如果您的GWT程式設定了 Session Management，您必須 將<aop:aspectj-autoproxy>的屬性"proxy-target-class"設為"false"，這是由於 Sprig AOP的proxy 機制不接受有參數的建構子，而SessionManagementFilter 的建構子卻含有參數 建立本類別實例
    GwtUsernamePasswordAuthority
    Monitor <form-login> event.
    When <form-login> come from GWT RPC, return void message when success and prone GwtBadCredentialsException when failed.
    HttpHolder
    The Class HttpHolder.
